snippet: Leicester defeated the Belgian champion Club Brugge, 3-0, in its Champions League opener. It is only Leicester’s fourth European competition in 132 years....

headline.main: A Dream Start as Leicester City’s Fairy Tale Arrives in Europe
headline.print_headline: One Dream Season, Made the Preface to Another

abstract: Rory Smith On Soccer column notes that Leicester City shutout Club Brugge, 3-0, in its first-ever Champions League match.
lead_paragraph: Leicester defeated the Belgian champion Club Brugge, 3-0, in its Champions League opener. It is only Leicester’s fourth European competition in 132 years.

snippet: Winning the League Cup can spark, just like it did two years ago, a Premier League surge for Manchester City, midfielder Fernandinho has said....

snippet: Manchester United's Jose Mourinho is fond of setting landmarks as a manager but becoming the first individual to be sent off twice in this season's Premier League is not one he will covet....

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's Jose Mourinho is fond of setting landmarks as a manager but becoming the first individual to be sent off twice in this season's Premier League is not one he will covet.

snippet: Chelsea forward Eden Hazard expects Manchester City and Liverpool to be the London side's main rivals in the Premier League title race after the top three sides all enjoyed victories on the weekend....

headline.main: Hazard Expects Three-Way Battle for Premier League Title

lead_paragraph: Chelsea forward Eden Hazard expects Manchester City and Liverpool to be the London side's main rivals in the Premier League title race after the top three sides all enjoyed victories on the weekend.

snippet: The Checkatrade Trophy, which had occupied a curious but cherished niche in England’s soccer firmament, has become its least-loved competition....

headline.main: A Once-Charming English Trophy Loses Its Luster and Its Fans
headline.print_headline: Once-Charming Trophy Loses Its Luster and Its Fans

abstract: Rory Smith On Soccer column discusses how English Football League opened up Checkatrade Trophy tournament to Premiere League teams in order to give promising players in lower tiers chance to play with their seniors; says rules change alienates fans, many of whom have stopped coming out to games.
lead_paragraph: The Checkatrade Trophy, which had occupied a curious but cherished niche in England’s soccer firmament, has become its least-loved competition.

snippet: Leicester visited Manchester City and came away with a 3-1 win over the high-priced club to stay in first place....

lead_paragraph: Leicester visited Manchester City and came away with a 3-1 win over the high-priced club to stay in first place.

snippet: A fourth successive 1-0 victory, this one over Southampton, sent Leicester to a 7-point lead in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: Leicester Closing on Premier League Title

abstract: Leicester City defeats Southampton, 1-0; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: A fourth successive 1-0 victory, this one over Southampton, sent Leicester to a 7-point lead in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur's Harry Kane scored twice in a 3-0 win over Bournemouth to thrust them back on to the heels of leaders Leicester City and become the leading Premier League marksman after another eventful Sunday in the top flight....

headline.main: Young Guns Kane and Rashford Light Up Premier League
headline.print_headline: Young Guns Kane and Rashford Light Up Premier League

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur's Harry Kane scored twice in a 3-0 win over Bournemouth to thrust them back on to the heels of leaders Leicester City and become the leading Premier League marksman after another eventful Sunday in the top flight.

snippet: Leicester strengthened its position atop the Premier League without even playing on Wednesday, after its three main title rivals all lost to cap another unpredictable round in England's top division....

headline.main: Spurs, Arsenal, Man City All Lose in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Spurs, Arsenal, Man City All Lose in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Leicester strengthened its position atop the Premier League without even playing on Wednesday, after its three main title rivals all lost to cap another unpredictable round in England's top division.
